channel.title: EvoScape
channel.description:
[center] [b][size=12pt]Hey guys. I've released the server to the public to play. You can play it by clicking the link in my signature and downloading it off the forums, OR you can play on the webclient. I'm still gonna use this development thread though, and add more things to it![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/358nbdf.png[/img]
[b]Well, I've started to work on EvoScape again, so I thought that I would post a development thread with my progress.[/b] [/center]
[b][Server Information][/b]
[ul][li]Base: Project Insanity (My version, heavily modified)[/li] [li]Server type: Economy.[/li][/ul]
[b][Updates][/b]
[ul][li]Re-wrote the Fight Caves minigame.[/li] [li]Re-wrote some of the Pest Control minigame.[/li] [li]Cleaned/deleted useless code.[/li] [li]Added new player rights.[/li] [li]Added new custom items (Dungeoneering weapons and armor, and PvP artefacts)[/li] [li]Added new interfaces. (Pest Control, Vengeance spell book)[/li] [li]Fixed Skillcape shop crash.[/li] [li]Added skill menus.[/li][/ul]
[b][Media][/b]
[ul][li]Artefacts: I'm making it so you talk to an NPC and he buys all of them off you. Basically, the better artefact you get, the more gold you get. Starting off at the first one for 100k, and the last one for 30m.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/3304j0o.jpg[/img]
[ul][li]Pest Control: I've updated Pest Control today, and I've succesfully added my own interfaces. They work 100%.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/23mo1lv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/desb2o.jpg[/img]
[ul][li]Skillcape shop fix: Very simple fix, but most Project Insanity servers still haven't fixed this yet. What it would do, if you had a lot of 99's or something, it would crash your client.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/14j44sk.jpg[/img]
[ul][li] Lunar spellbook: I've succesfully added the full Lunar spellbook. I'm still working on a few spells, but I've got the main ones down. (Vengeance spells)[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/rbmgqv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2gtrmn7.jpg[/img]
[ul][li]Skill menus: I've added skill menus for every single skill. I'm working on updating them to add all of the information. [/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2jcj70x.jpg[/img]
Will add more pictures later.
[b][size=12pt]Also, the forums are in my signature if you would like more information. :)[/size][/b]

PI, and a tutorial for pvp drops, good job?
[/quote]

Finnaly someone who see’s this is nothing more then a tut follower i dare you to add full pest control

Gods arrow you are FTW![/quote]

item.title: EvoScape
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[center]
[size=12pt]Hey guys. I’ve released the server to the public to play. You can play it by clicking the link in my signature and downloading it off the forums, OR you can play on the webclient. I’m still gonna use this development thread though, and add more things to it![/size]

Well, I’ve started to work on EvoScape again, so I thought that I would post a development thread with my progress.
[/center]

[Server Information]

[ul][li]Base: Project Insanity (My version, heavily modified)[/li]
[li]Server type: Economy.[/li][/ul]

[Updates]

[ul][li]Re-wrote the Fight Caves minigame.[/li]
[li]Re-wrote some of the Pest Control minigame.[/li]
[li]Cleaned/deleted useless code.[/li]
[li]Added new player rights.[/li]
[li]Added new custom items (Dungeoneering weapons and armor, and PvP artefacts)[/li]
[li]Added new interfaces. (Pest Control, Vengeance spell book)[/li]
[li]Fixed Skillcape shop crash.[/li]
[li]Added skill menus.[/li][/ul]

[Media]

[ul][li]Artefacts: I’m making it so you talk to an NPC and he buys all of them off you. Basically, the better artefact you get, the more gold you get. Starting off at the first one for 100k, and the last one for 30m.[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Pest Control: I’ve updated Pest Control today, and I’ve succesfully added my own interfaces. They work 100%.[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Skillcape shop fix: Very simple fix, but most Project Insanity servers still haven’t fixed this yet. What it would do, if you had a lot of 99’s or something, it would crash your client.[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]
Lunar spellbook: I’ve succesfully added the full Lunar spellbook. I’m still working on a few spells, but I’ve got the main ones down. (Vengeance spells)[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Skill menus: I’ve added skill menus for every single skill. I’m working on updating them to add all of the information.
[/li][/ul]

Will add more pictures later.

[size=12pt]Also, the forums are in my signature if you would like more information. :)[/size]

Read full topic
